name: SpeechTrans
tag_list: speech-recogntion, voip, sts, tts, speechtrans, asr, iphone, android, speech-translation, translate, interprephone
overview: SpeechTrans is a full solution to automated multi-lingual communications without the need for a human interpreter. SpeechTrans partners with Nuance Communications to bring the highest level of accuracy for Speech to Speech translation in all of it’s products. They have also partnered with HP and have embedded their API into HP’s MyRoom Web Conferencing software to allow video chat and webinars to be conducted in different languages with SpeechTrans handling the speech to speech translation in real time. They are also a Microsoft Managed partner and have Speech to Speech and live Video Translation applications for Windows, Mac, iOS, Android, Blackberry, and Landline telephones through their IntperprePhone TM System. Their systems have been used at doctors offices, military applications, EMT, customer service, lawyers, housekeepers, and anyone who needs to instantly speak and understand different languages.
